messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: In Need New Close Friends
messages.msgSnippet: on 1/20/03 11:19 AM, evelyns92  at evelynsfarm@msn.com ... Because anyone can join and anyone can post. The only way to prevent it is if
messages.messageBody:
on 1/20/03 11:19 AM, evelyns92 <evelynsfarm@...> at evelynsfarm@...
wrote:

> How in the world did this subject end up here? Anyone know how the
> post was allowed? Charming. --- In Unschooling-

Because anyone can join and anyone can post. The only way to prevent it is
if someone were to preread every single post before it gets sent out to
everyone on the list.

Or to have everyone wait for approval before joining. Not only is that
offputting but how would someone go about checking?

Are you volunteering? ;-)

Spam happens so rarely on the list (famous last words ;-) that it really
isn't worth the extra hours of work involved in preventing it.

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator
